QuestData.Title: The Leftovers
QuestData.Description: We fought hard to capture this island, $r. We cleared out most of the Alliance filth but I can still smell their foul stench in the air.$b$bI need you to investigate the slagworks, warden's vigil and the ironclad garrison. Kill any Alliance that you find.$B$BYou know what they say, the only good Alliance is a dead Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: You have been instructed to kill 12 Alliance Infantry on Tol Barad. You can find the holdouts in The Slagworks, Warden's Vigil and the Ironclad Garrison, here on Tol Barad.
QuestData.RewardText: Those filthy alliance never stood a chance. Nice work, $n.
